p: BSFL fed on the different substrates exhibited different accumulation patterns of minerals (Table 4). Five major minerals, i.e. required in amounts greater >100 mg/day, were detected. Of those, potassium (DF = 2; F = 13.41; R 2 = 0.641; p = 0.0005), calcium (DF = 2; F = 68.58; R 2 = 0.901; p < 0.0001) and magnesium (DF = 2; F = 3.65; R 2 = 0.328; p = 0.051) significantly differed among the tested BSFL whereas sodium did not.
